CustomField.formula: IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'BusinessAccount'&& CountOpportunitiesAuto__c = CountOpenOpportunitiesAuto__c, 'Prospect', IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'BusinessAccount'&& CountOpportunitiesAuto__c > 0&& CountWonOpportunitiesAuto__c > 0&& DLRS_CurrentProjectsTrig__c = 0, 'Past Customer', IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'BusinessAccount'&& CountOpportunitiesAuto__c > 0&& CountWonOpportunitiesAuto__c > 1&& DLRS_CurrentProjectsTrig__c > 0, 'Customer', IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'BusinessAccount'&& CountOpportunitiesAuto__c = CountLostOpportunitiesAuto__c, 'Lost Prospect', '' ))))
CustomField.label: Account Type
